metadata.sysdescription: Fymla is the technological nerve center of the Confederation, home to sprawling orbital dockyards and the Ximni Gateforge, where the latest generation of jump coils and gate relays are constructed. The system’s innermost planet, Fym-II, is tidally locked — its permanent twilight band houses vast energy farms that harvest the planet’s magnetic storms. Fymla’s shipyards are constantly alive with neon-lit scaffolds, and the local culture celebrates engineers as celebrities, often featuring them in holo-dramas and competitions. Fymla is also notorious for “slipfire storms” — spontaneous bursts of electromagnetic radiation that can scramble unshielded navigation systems.
